title: [ARCH] Migrate MCP from mcp-sdk-rs to rmcp
description: rmcp is the official Rust MCP SDK (modelcontextprotocol org), 3.6M downloads, v0.15.0, typed APIs, streamable HTTP transport. Current mcp-sdk-rs is 'not production ready' with outdated spec. Migration is ~100 lines in src/mcp/mod.rs. See ai/research/rmcp-and-colgrep-crates-2026-02.md
